intro: Psychotria gundlachii, commonly known as the yellow psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of Central and South America, particularly found in the Amazon rainforest. The plant is characterized by its small, glossy leaves and clusters of yellowish-white flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in understory layers of dense forests. Psychotria gundlachii is also noted for its chemical composition, which includes various alkaloids.
